title: Chaahat
writer: Robin Bhatt, Akash Khurana, Javed Siddiqui
short_cast: Naseeruddin Shah, Shah Rukh Khan, Pooja Bhatt, Anupam Kher, Ramya Krishnan, Avtar Gill, Mushtaq Khan
cast: Naseeruddin Shah, Shah Rukh Khan, Pooja Bhatt, Anupam Kher, Ramya Krishnan, Avtar Gill, Mushtaq Khan
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Dramas, Romantic Movies
desc: A vulnerable singer is forced to choose between the girl he loves and another who has developed an unhealthy obsession with him.
